Story: Migrate to UUID PKs and FK indexes
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin): Given running DB when migrations applied then all tables use UUID PKs and FKs are indexed

Story: Implement agent orchestrator and 3 core agents
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin): Given tasks submitted when orchestrator schedules then agents execute and return results

Story: Align backend model defaults with Ollama
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin): Given config when app starts then TinyLlama is default and gpt-oss optional

Story: Define Kong routes/services for all APIs
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin): Given gateway when healthcheck runs then routes respond 200
Given protected endpoint when called without token then 401; with valid token then 200
Given doc upload when processed then embeddings stored and searchable
Given canonical set when published then duplicates marked deprecated
Given deployment when env loaded then no hardcoded secrets remain
